
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18937243" title="发布于 2025-06-19 22:06">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">GitHub 汉化神器，2步快速解锁中文化 GitHub 界面！</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>你是否曾因 GitHub 的英文界面而头疼，不知道该如何上手使用？现在，通过github-chinese这款开源（GPL-3.0 license）、免费的汉化插件，只需简单2步即可实现 GitHub 网页端中文化界面！</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>github-chinese开源地址：</strong>&nbsp;<a href="https://github.com/maboloshi/github-chinese" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/maboloshi/github-chinese</a></li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p><span>你是否会经常遇到 GitHub 无法访问、或者是访问和下载源码十分缓慢的情况。大家可以在我的公众号《<strong>追逐时光者</strong><span>》回复关键字：<strong>《github加速、github加速神器、GitHub加速》</strong><span>，获取3个GitHub免费加速神器。</span></span></span></p>
</blockquote>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>更多GitHub使用技巧</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide?tab=readme-ov-file#github" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide?tab=readme-ov-file#github</span></a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202506/1336199-20250619220436506-829595496.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>插件功能</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>中文化 GitHub 菜单栏，标题，按钮等公共组件。</span></li>
<li><span>支持对 “项目描述” 进行人机翻译。</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>支持浏览器</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>Chrome 或 基于 <span>Chromium 内核的浏览器。</span></span></li>
<li><span>Safari 浏览器（macOS, iOS, iPadOS）。</span></li>
<li><span>Firefox 或 基于 <span>Gecko 内核的浏览器。</span></span></li>
<li><span>Via 浏览器（Android）。</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Tampermonkey插件安装</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Tampermonkey（<span>油猴）是一款广受欢迎且功能极其强大的浏览器脚本管理扩展。它的核心价值在于允许用户发现、安装和管理“用户脚本”（Userscripts）。这些用户脚本本质上是小段的 JavaScript 代码，它们能够在您访问特定网页时自动运行，从而实现对网页内容和行为的深度定制。</span></span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>下载地址：<a href="https://www.tampermonkey.net/index.php" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://www.tampermonkey.net/index.php</a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202506/1336199-20250619220502584-1923072489.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>未安装汉化插件之前界面效果</span></h2>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202506/1336199-20250619220519397-2051114712.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202506/1336199-20250619220523416-2014393470.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202506/1336199-20250619220528910-1217620666.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Chrome 浏览器安装汉化插件</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>安装脚本：<a href="https://www.tampermonkey.net/script_installation.php#url=https://github.com/maboloshi/github-chinese/raw/gh-pages/main.user.js" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://www.tampermonkey.net/script_installation.php#url=https://github.com/maboloshi/github-chinese/raw/gh-pages/main.user.js</a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202506/1336199-20250619220545810-1869592032.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202506/1336199-20250619220549994-781773443.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202506/1336199-20250619220554939-1194611117.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202506/1336199-20250619220601665-674273513.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202506/1336199-20250619220607490-1369523512.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202506/1336199-20250619220613071-1909041335.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
</div>
